titleStmt.title: The vvay to a blessed estate in this life. By Ezekel Culuervvel.
titleStmt.author: Culverwell, Ezekiel, 1553 or 4-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Dawson, for William Sheffard, and are to be sold at his shop, at the entring in of Popes-head Alley out of Lumbard-streete,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for a fleuron and rules.
Usually bound with author's "A treatise of faith," third edition, 1623 (STC 6115).
In this edition, A3r has a headpiece of type ornaments.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
Appears as part of STC 6115 on reel 1544 (British Library copy) and by itself at reel 1749 (same copy filmed again).
